Perks.title: How Do We Make It Possible?

security.title: Security
security.description: We use cutting-edge technology and rigorous protocols to protect your information and assets.

invest.title: Invest from $50 USD
invest.description: Take your first steps into the investment world and start building your portfolio from low amounts.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We seek new ways to help you reach your investment goals.

freedom.title: Financial Freedom
freedom.description: We help you achieve financial independence through solid projects.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: We offer a platform where you can invest easily and quickly from anywhere in the world.

decentralization.title: Decentralization
decentralization.description: You control your assets and investment decisions thanks to the Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO).

headline.desktop: A Gateway to Real Estate Investment

intro.description: At Throu, we believe in the power of blockchain technology and real estate investment to make the world a more equitable place. Our mission is to make real estate investments simple and accessible to everyone, no matter where they are or how much they wish to invest.

democratize.title: Democratize
democratize.description: We believe everyone should have the opportunity to invest in real estate. That’s why we are removing entry barriers and making real estate investment accessible to all.

simplify.title: Simplify
simplify.description: We make real estate investing easy. Our platform is intuitive and easy to use, and our team is always available to assist you every step of the way.

dynamize.title: Dynamize
dynamize.description: We’re using blockchain technology to make real estate investment more efficient and transparent. With Throu, you can see exactly where your money is going and how it’s being used.

team.quote: The future of real estate investment is here, and you’re a part of it.

headline.desktop: Our Team: Experts Dedicated to Your Service

teamMetrics.description: At Throu, we have a team of experts in real estate, blockchain, finance, and investment. Our team is dedicated to finding, analyzing, and selecting the best investment opportunities for our users. We are here to help you at every step of your investment journey, from choosing projects to purchasing tokens. Our team consists of passionate professionals committed to democratizing real estate investment. Together, we are changing the way the world invests in real estate.

HomeFooter.description: Take advantage of our platform to explore new financial opportunities.
